articles.description: After Mohammed Kudus cancelled out Mo Salah's opener, Joel Matip gave the Reds' European campaign lift-off with a dramatic late winner to bring respite for Jurgen Klopp.
articles.content:

articles.title: What to expect from the rand in the coming months - BusinessTech
articles.description: South Africa’s rand is expected to be beaten around by global markets in the coming months, as inflationary and interest rate pressure from central banks in the US and the European Union continue to dominate global market movements.
